sources.title: Under the Big Top (1938)
sources.description: Director Karl Brown's 1938 circus drama stars Marjorie Main as a tough, fur-coat-wearing circus boss who raises her orphaned niece to be a trapeze star. Watch on RetroFlix:¬† https://retroflix.org/under-the-big-top-1938/

sources.title: Under The Big Top
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Under the Big Top
sources.description: A simple of tale of love and romance among trapeze artist in a traveling circus.

sources.title: Under the Big Top (1938) MAJORIE MAINüçïJACK LA RUE
sources.description:
Stars: Marjorie Main, Anne Nagel, Jack La Rue
Director: Karl Brown

A pretty young circus trapeze artist is pushed by her domineering aunt to be the best aerialist in the world. When she begins to fall for one of the two men in her act, her aunt determines to break up the romance. So does the other trapeze artist, who is also in love with her!

metadata.Plot: A pretty young circus trapeze artist is pushed by her domineering aunt to be the best aerialist in the world. When she begins to fall for one of the two men in her act, her mother determines to break up the romance. So does the other trapeze artist, who is also in love with her.
metadata.Actors: Marjorie Main, Anne Nagel, Jack La Rue
